data:
Use of this module is for patients with diarrhea (unformed watery stools - type 6 and 7 greater than 3 in 24 hours) AND 
1. Pending C. difficile test with high suspicion, OR 
2. Positive C. difficile test, OR 
3. Endoscopic or histologic evidence of pseudomembranous colitis
C. difficile Infection (CDI) Clinical Management Algorithm
Ensure Contact Precautions Plus sign is visible on the door to patient room to  notify housekeeping enhanced cleaning required
Discontinue antimotility or promotility agents and Bowel Protocol. Discontinue antimicrobial agents and proton pump inhibitors if possible
First or second episode (i.e. first recurrence) for mild or moderate disease
7.5 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
7.5 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
7.5 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: tab
7.5 mg/kg, IV, q6h, order duration: 10 day, drug form: inj
If patient not tolerating metroNIDAZOLE or diarrhea not resolving by day 4 to 6, discontinue metroNIDAZOLE and order vancomycin
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: cap
Third or further episodes: Option #1 - vancomycin 14 day course
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: cap
Third or further episodes: Option #2 - vancomycin tapering course
Select all 4 vancomycin orders below for full taper
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq, start: T; 0800
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq, start: T; 0800
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: cap, start: T; 0800
10 mg/kg, PO, BID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+10;0800
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, BID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+10;0800
10 mg/kg, PO, BID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: cap, Start: T+10;0800
10 mg/kg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+17;0800
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+17;0800
10 mg/kg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: cap, Start: T+17;0800
10 mg/kg, PO, q2day, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+24;0800
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, q2day, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq, Start: T+24;0800
10 mg/kg, PO, q2day, order duration: 14 day, drug form: cap, Start: T+24;0800

ANY of the following:
- Acute kidney injury with rising serum creatinine (SCr)
- Pseudomembranous colitis
- Clinical judgment (age, fever, etc.)
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 10 day, drug form: cap

ANY of the following:
- Toxic megacolon
- Perforation
- Signs of peritonitis
- Ileus
- Severe sepsis/septic shock
- Severe acute renal failure (i.e. oliguria or dialysis requirement)
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, NG-tube, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: oral liq
10 mg/kg, PO, QID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: cap
7.5 mg/kg, IV, q6h, order duration: 14 day, drug form: inj
Basic Metabolic Panel (Lytes, Urea, Creat, Gluc)
XR Abdomen 2 Views and Chest 1 View
Consider consultation with Infectious Diseases, Gastroenterology and General Surgery
